name: 4 Dragons Sudoku
description:
- most prestigious Sudoku game with 30,000 puzzles
- interactive hint system
- unlimited amount of hints
- 3 levels of difficulty - Easy, Normal, Hard
- 2 game modes - Casual and Timed
- integrated system for taking notes for each number cell
- runs on all iOS devices !
- play for FREE or convert to PREMIUM version
- option to explore more games from Ocean Media
